1. Commits in Git are snapshots of the files being tracked within a project folder.
2. A branch in Git is a pointer in the project that points to a specific commit.
3. A pull request the developor a summary of the changes to the repository before they merge it.
4. with the "git init" command
5. with the "git clone <url of the repository>" command
6. with the "git add ." command to stage all files or the "git add <filename>" to stage a specific file only
7. with the "git push" command
